alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LINCOLN...SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN AND CUSTER COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds from thunderstorm outflow extending from 8 miles northwest of Anselmo to 9 miles south of Gandy to near Hershey. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Broken Bow, Sutherland, Hershey, Arnold, Callaway, Brady, Merna, Maxwell, Oconto, Anselmo, Berwyn, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Weissert, Keith, Westerville and Lillian. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 95 and 108. Highway 2 between mile markers 250 and 291. Highway 92 between mile markers 240 and 273. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 155 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 61 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
